_header: Man have in mind and mend thy miss / While thou art heir…
Note: This piece is closely related to 3352.
_description: Memor esto nouissima — six 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with this refrain

EDU205.First Lines:
Man haf in mynd & mend þi mysquhill þow art heir in
                    lyf lyffand…
EDU205.Last Lines:
…And shild þefa þe fendis plychtmemor esto
                        mouissima
